lap_time_hist <- lap_time %>% 
  filter(milliseconds <365000 & milliseconds >60000 & driverId==1)

lap_data <- left_join(lap_time,races,by = 'raceId')
lap_data <- lap_data[,1:7]
lap_data <- left_join(lap_data,driver, by='driverId')
lap_data <- lap_data[,1:10]

 #filter(driverId == 1 | driverId == 4 | driverId == 20 | driverId == 822 | driverId==815 | driverId==832 | driverId == 830 | driverId == 844) %>% 

lap_story <- lap_data %>%
  filter(driverId %in% c(1,4,20,822,815,832,830,844) ) %>% 
  group_by(driverRef, year) %>% 
  summarize(mean=mean(milliseconds))

lap_story

ggplot(lap_story, aes(x=year, y=mean, color = driverRef))+
  geom_line()
